summary: Shows distribution of authentication preferences of users over time
description: Retrieves the distribution of authentication preferences in given time slices to produce time-series analytics.

parameters.name: window
parameters.description: Specifies size of the window in seconds to perform time-series analysis.

parameters.name: frames
parameters.description: Specifies number of windows to perform time-series analysis.

mean.description: Expected value of the time-series source.

items.description: The array will contain sample data in pre-determined order: Index, number of insecure authentication users, pre-OTC over SMS users, pre-OTC over email users, pre-OTC over guard users and timestamp of the sample.

200.description: Response containing time-series data and statistics.
